short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Position and move your tabs to set positions on your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions lets you save window sizes and positions and link them to hot keys.  
Instances where Tab Control might be helpful:
- When you want a window on the left side of the screen and another on the right side of the screen.  
- When you already have a window on the left and right and want to move a tab from the left to the right.
